data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was obtained, analyte type, tumor status, histological type, primary or metastatic tumor, and sequencing center of participants with or without hepatocellular carcinoma and involved in the "CAGE Profiling of ncRNAs in Hepatocellular Carcinoma Reveals a Strong Activation of Retroviral LTR Promoters in Virus-Induced Tumors" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: PRIMARY_METASTATIC_TUMOR
variable.description: Primary tumor, metastasis, or transformed cell line

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing
